lead_paragraph: Liverpool have been roughing up Loris Karius with rugby tackle pads in training to help the goalkeeper adapt to the physicality of the Premier League, manager Juergen Klopp has said.

headline.print_headline: Liverpool Turn to Rugby Tactics to Help Karius Adapt
headline.main: Liverpool Turn to Rugby Tactics to Help Karius Adapt

snippet: Liverpool have been roughing up Loris Karius with rugby tackle pads in training to help the goalkeeper adapt to the physicality of the Premier League, manager Juergen Klopp has said....
